org.janelia.flyem.neuprinter.db

Class DbTransactionBatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.janelia.flyem.neuprinter.db.DbTransactionBatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, TransactionBatch

    public class DbTransactionBatch
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransactionBatch
    Collects statements into transaction batches reducing the total number of database commits.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addStatement(org.neo4j.driver.v1.Statement statement)
      Adds the specified statement to the current batch and if the batch limit is reached, writes (commits) all previously batched statements.
      void close()
      Closes the transactional parent resource (e.g.
      void writeTransaction()
      Writes (commits) any remaining uncommitted previously batched statements.
